dcterms:description: The dataset consists of µECoG data from an acute in vivo feline model of seizures, recorded using a high-density electrode array with 500 µm spacing between channels. The recording has a temporal sampling rate of 277.78 Hz and lasts for 53 minutes, resulting in a total of 894K frames, with 788K frames for training and 106K frames for testing.
dcterms:title: µECoG data
